sentences: In the conclusions (FCCC/CP/2004/L.3), the COP invites Annex I Parties to make contributions to the UNFCCC Trust Fund for Supplementary Activities in order to facilitate preparatory work by the Secretariat in 2005 and draws attention to the need to make nominations to the Article 6 Supervisory Committee so that COP/MOP-1 will be in a position to elect its members and alternate members.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
